verses.verse: My <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5720><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, the YY of glory <S%G1391><s%>, with <S%G1722><s%> respect of persons <S%G4382><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> there come <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5632><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> assembly <S%G4864><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> with a gold ring <S%G5554><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> goodly <S%G2986><s%> apparel <S%G2066><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> there come in <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5632><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> a poor man <S%G4434><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> vile <S%G4508><s%> raiment <S%G2066><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> ye have respect <S%G1914><s%> <S%G5661><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> him that weareth <S%G5409><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the gay <S%G2986><s%> clothing <S%G2066><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5632><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Sit <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5737><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> in a good place <S%G2573><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5632><s%> to the poor <S%G4434><s%>, Stand <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5628><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> sit <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5737><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> footstool <S%G5286><s%>:

Are ye <S%G1252><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> partial <S%G1252><s%> <S%G5681><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> are become <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> judges <S%G2923><s%> of evil <S%G4190><s%> thoughts <S%G1261><s%>?

Hearken <S%G191><s%> <S%G5657><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, Hath <S%G1586><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> chosen <S%G1586><s%> <S%G5668><s%> the poor <S%G4434><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> heirs <S%G2818><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he hath promised <S%G1861><s%> <S%G5662><s%> to them that love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5723><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> have despised <S%G818><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the poor <S%G4434><s%>. Do <S%G2616><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> rich men <S%G4145><s%> oppress <S%G2616><s%> <S%G5719><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> draw <S%G846><s%> <S%G1670><s%> <S%G5719><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> before <S%G1519><s%> the judgment seats <S%G2922><s%>?

Do <S%G987><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> they <S%G846><s%> blaspheme <S%G987><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that worthy <S%G2570><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> the which ye <S%G5209><s%> are called <S%G1941><s%> <S%G5685><s%>?

If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3305><s%> ye fulfil <S%G5055><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the royal <S%G937><s%> Torah <S%G3551><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%>, Thou shalt love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> neighbour <S%G4139><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%>, ye do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%> well <S%G2573><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye have respect to persons <S%G4380><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, ye commit <S%G2038><s%> <S%G5736><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>, and are convinced <S%G1651><s%> <S%G5746><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> transgressors <S%G3848><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> whosoever <S%G3748><s%> shall keep <S%G5083><s%> <S%G5692><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> Torah <S%G3551><s%>, and yet <S%G1161><s%> offend <S%G4417><s%> <S%G5692><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> point, he is <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5754><s%> guilty <S%G1777><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he that said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, Do <S%G3431><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> commit adultery <S%G3431><s%> <S%G5661><s%>, said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, Do <S%G5407><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> kill <S%G5407><s%> <S%G5661><s%>. Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> thou commit <S%G3431><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> adultery <S%G3431><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, yet if <S%G1161><s%> thou kill <S%G5407><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, thou art become <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5754><s%> a transgressor <S%G3848><s%> of the Torah <S%G3551><s%>.

So <S%G3779><s%> speak ye <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5720><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5720><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> they that shall be <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5723><s%> judged <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5745><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> of liberty <S%G1657><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he shall have judgment <S%G2920><s%> without mercy <S%G448><s%>, that hath shewed <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5660><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> rejoiceth against <S%G2620><s%> <S%G5736><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5632><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Depart <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5720><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, be ye warmed <S%G2328><s%> <S%G5728><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> filled <S%G5526><s%> <S%G5744><s%>; notwithstanding <S%G1161><s%> ye give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5632><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> those things which are needful <S%G2006><s%> to the body <S%G4983><s%>; what <S%G5101><s%> doth it profit <S%G3786><s%>?

Thou <S%G4771><s%> believest <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>; thou doest <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5719><s%> well <S%G2573><s%>: the devils <S%G1140><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> tremble <S%G5425><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

Was <S%G1344><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> Avraham <S%G11><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> <S%G5681><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, when he had offered <S%G399><s%> <S%G5660><s%> Yitz'chak <S%G2464><s%> his <S%G846><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%>?

Seest thou <S%G991><s%> <S%G5719><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> wrought <S%G4903><s%> <S%G5707><s%> with his <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> was <S%G5048><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> made perfect <S%G5048><s%> <S%G5681><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> the scripture <S%G1124><s%> was fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5681><s%> which saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, <S%G1161><s%> Avraham <S%G11><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5656><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> it was imputed <S%G3049><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he was called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5681><s%> the Friend <S%G5384><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Ye see <S%G3708><s%> <S%G5719><s%> then <S%G5106><s%> how that <S%G3754><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> is justified <S%G1344><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> only <S%G3440><s%>.

Likewise <S%G3668><s%> <S%G1161><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> was <S%G1344><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> Rachav <S%G4460><s%> the harlot <S%G4204><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> <S%G5681><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>, when she had received <S%G5264><s%> <S%G5666><s%> the messengers <S%G32><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> had sent them out <S%G1544><s%> <S%G5631><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> way <S%G3598><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%>, so <S%G3779><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>.
